column5: Bought this at XS Cargo for about $4.  The picture shows using the clip for a cell phone camera, however the screw for the detachable clip fits most cameras.  Wow, no more tripping over the dog and tackle box and taking five practice shots.  The bottom is a suction cup.
Great store HF.Lots of great deals.  I like the tripod.Should do the job just fine.
Thanks for the info, I like the suction cup.
dollarama has some that dont have a suction cup and are about 6" tall they work great also.
